title: Can't find my pixel 3 backup file
content: I sent my Pixel 3 off for repair and used my old Samsung S7. I was unable to restore my pixel 3 backup onto that phone. I now have my pixel 3 back however it only gives me the option to restore the S7 and not the previous Pixel 3. How do I find the older backup?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
